leadPara: LONDON, March 5 -- The Queen, accompanied by ex-Empress Frederick and Princess Beatrice, arrived at Buckingham Palace this morning. headline: LOUIS KOSSUTH'S LIFE ENDED; THE GREAT HUNGARIAN PATRIOT DEAD AT TURIN. He Was the Deseendant of a Noble Family, Always Noted for Its Patriotism -- Educated for the Law, He Entered Politics and Was Imprisoned for Treason, Then Released -- A Life of Devotion to His Country and People.

headline: SENATOR SHERMAN'S VIEWS.

headline: NEWS OF THE RAILROADS; Isaac L. Rice Criticises the Olcott- Earle Reading Plan. THREE REASONS URGED AGAINST IT The Plan Based on Delusive Figures, Fixed Charges Largely Increased, and An Inadequate Treasury.
leadPara: Isaac L. Rice issued a statement yesterday afternoon in opposition to the OlcottEarle plan for the reorganization of the Philadelphia and Reading Railroad. Mr. Rice says that he opposese the plan for many reasons, the most important of which are: first, because it is based on delusive figures; second, because it makes an enormous increase of fixed charges prior to the general mortgage interest, and third, because it provides a ridiculously inadequate treasury reserve.
